page.title: 16GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 2/2
page.content:
{HANDGAMES Nuts,Knuckles,Skipping,Clapping Games.
{STRIDING GAMES Sly Fox,Letters,Aunts and Uncles,May I,Whats The Time Mr Wolf. { {HIDING GAMES Hide and Seek,Block,Sardines. How to play:{POOK THE TIN There is a tin on the ground and someone is "it" and they count and stand by the tin. When it is time to come and find the others then they have to run and kick the tin. If they kick the tin before the catchee gets the tin, catchee is him again. If the catchee gets them all then the first one caught is "it" and they start all over again.{ { { }
